name: Ghost Absorber
description:
Absorb ghosts with your proton pack to become stronger.

A game for Score Space Jam #20. Made in 24 hours.

Used Assets:

  • ghost (https://dyru.itch.io/pixel-ghost-template)
  • player (https://trevor-pupkin.itch.io/outer-buddies)
  • crosshairs (https://kenney-assets.itch.io/crosshair-pack)
  • tiles (https://szadiart.itch.io/rogue-fantasy-catacombs)
  • music (https://davidkbd.itch.io/eternity-metal-scfi-music-pack)
  • lightning (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/particles-effects/lightning-bolt-eff...)
